about_the_game:
You wake up as a mage, trapped deep within a goblin-infested dungeon. Fortunately, your trusty butterfly companion manages to set you free. Now, it's up to your imagination and your ability to control minds to find your way out!

Get ready for a classic 2D dungeon-crawling adventure with a twist—Mind Weaver lets you shift control between different characters. But there’s a catch: you can only manipulate the minds of creatures you can see, so make your decisions wisely. Each level presents its own unique challenges, from puzzle-solving and tricky parkour to dodging aggressive goblins. Along the way, you’ll encounter the quirky merchant who’ll do just about anything for a juicy PAPAYA.

This is a solo project, so while there's no game-saving feature just yet (sorry!), I’m eager to see if others find the game as fun and intriguing as I do. If you are game dev and desire to contribute, please do! The code is open source (you can find it on github).
